T98obrJsjJA-2.title: You cannot delete your account

tosdr.case: no right to leave the service
tosdr.tldr: It is impossible to delete your account from this service, according to the AccountKiller blacklist.

meta.author: Hugo for “Terms of Service; Didn't Read”
meta.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA

any-time-without-notice.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

eff-back-tell-user.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
eff-back-tell-user.title: Promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: A public commitment to inform users when their data is sought by the government, unless prohibited by law. This gives you a chance to defend yourself against overreaching government demands for their data. (cc-by eff)

eff-back-transparency-data.title: Transparency on law enforcement requests

tosdr.tldr: The service is making clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.

kizrN7qb1Ck5.title: Limited copyright license to Wordpress.com including for promotion

tosdr.case: limited for purpose of same service
tosdr.tldr: You grant a copyright license to Automattic's Wordpress.com “solely for the purpose of displaying, distributing and promoting your blog.”
